MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH49 postcode area of Upton, affecting properties in Ford Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 05.08am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 08.15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07.19am on 27th April 2021.
